unittitle_ssm: Brooklyn Friends School Post-It Mural collection
abstract_ssm:
The collection includes several hundred sticky notes (i.e., Post-its) posted by third grade students at the Brooklyn Friends School to a wall in the Lower School Library from December 2016 to February 2017. Inspired in part
by artist Matthew "Levee" Chavez's work Subway Therapy, the students' project was a response to the 2016 U.S. presidential election.
